layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x62
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x62
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x46
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 548x46 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 546x44
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 546x40
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 270x40 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (11,11) size 248x18
                text run at (11,11) width 248: "This cell should have an 10px padding"
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (274,2) size 270x40 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (11,11) size 248x18
